DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study evaluate compare relative bioavailability single 0.6 mg tablet Colcrys® ( colchicine , USP ) crush dissolve apple juice relative dose give intact tablet healthy subject follow overnight fast . Sixteen healthy , non-smoking , non-obese , male female volunteer 18-55 year age randomly assign crossover fashion receive two dose regimen sequence 14 day washout period dose period . In dose period , overnight fast , subject receive one intact Colcrys® 0.6 mg tablet ( follow 240 mL water ) one Colcrys® 0.6 mg tablet crush dissolve 20 mL apple juice ( follow 220 mL water ) accord randomization schedule . Blood sample draw participant dose 48 hour post-dose time sufficient adequately define pharmacokinetics colchicine . Vital sign ( blood pressure , heart rate , respiratory rate , temperature ) measure prior dose 1 hour ± 30 minute post dose . Subjects monitor throughout participation study adverse reaction .
